name: Sniper Shooter Stickman Fury
description:
Welcome to Sniper Shooter Stickman 1 Fury - Now Kill Shot Bravo - The best action game for IOS mobile !
If you like hitman, this is a rpg shooting game Fit for you.

Not Sniper 3D , this is a elite shooter American stickman 2D.

Do you want to test your reaction with Kill Shot ?

Use Kung Fu with gun be like Japanese Ninja or China martial-art Master.

Pick up a gun and counter strike a hundred , a thousand stickmen hunter, a million SWAT enemy.

Fast, faster , fastest !

Don't need be a sniper, a gunner, a gun shooter , and have not to run, you only need tap tap and tap to destroy all enemies in stickman war.

********* How to play *************

- You must destroy killer stickmen from Top, Middle , Bottom at screen.

- Contract : 100 point = 10 coins.

- Kill a thief you earn 5 coins.

- Use coins to buy modern weapons in the arsenal (shop).

****** Weapon System *************

Many guns in CS or CF !!!!!

- Pistol ( Desert Eagle)

- Colt

- AK-47

- Laser

- M60 (machine 60)

- M4A1

- Shot Gun (Hunting gun)

- Sniper Rifle

- Paintball

- Uzi

****** Feature ******

- You can choose so many weapon to destroy enemy.

- You can customise your stickman with thousand of costume.

- Compare score with all people on the world.

- Reach top of the world with world ranking system.

- Play game anywhere and anytime ! Because Sniper Shooter Stickman 1 Fury doesn't require you always online. You can play it in the plane, in the subway, in the car on the road, even in a temple. OK ? Just simply is offline game !

*********************************************


****************Coming soon*******************

- Multiplayer online !


******************NOTE ***************************

* This game is so amazing so you shouldn't play game 2 or 3 hours / day to keep your health.

* In game , have a blood scenes and violence. You may want to keep away it from your kids , younger boys and girls.

*********************************************

Let choose the coolest costume, most beautiful fashion , the strongest weapon and show your friends !

Let's download game and start combat with Sniper Shooter Stickman 1 Edition Fury by Fun Team Game for Free NOW!
